verses.verse: And it <S%H1961>came<s%> to pass, when <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of the <S%H567>Amorites,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> were on the <S%H5676>side<s%> of <S%H3383>Jordan<s%> <S%H3220>westward,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of the <S%H3669>Canaanites,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> were by the <S%H3220>sea,<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> that the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> had <S%H3001>dried<s%> up the <S%H4325>waters<s%> of <S%H3383>Jordan<s%> from <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> we were <S%H5674>passed<s%> <S%H5674>over,<s%> that their <S%H3824>heart<s%> <S%H4549>melted,<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> was there <S%H7307>spirit<s%> in them any <S%H5750>more,<s%> <S%H6440>because<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

At that <S%H6256>time<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3091>Joshua,<s%> <S%H6213>Make<s%> you <S%H6697>sharp<s%> <S%H2719>knives,<s%> and <S%H4135>circumcise<s%> <S%H7725>again<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> the <S%H8145>second<s%> time.

And <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H6213>made<s%> him <S%H6697>sharp<s%> <S%H2719>knives,<s%> and <S%H4135>circumcised<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H413>at<s%> the <S%H1389>hill<s%> of the <S%H6190>foreskins.<s%>

And <S%H2088>this<s%> is the <S%H1697>cause<s%> <S%H834>why<s%> <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> did <S%H4135>circumcise:<s%> <S%H3605>All<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> that <S%H3318>came<s%> out of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> that were <S%H2145>males,<s%> even <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H582>men<s%> of <S%H4421>war,<s%> <S%H4191>died<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> by the <S%H1870>way,<s%> after they <S%H3318>came<s%> out of <S%H4714>Egypt.<s%>

<S%H3588>Now<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> that <S%H3318>came<s%> out were <S%H4135>circumcised:<s%> but <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> that were <S%H3209>born<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> by the <S%H1870>way<s%> as they <S%H3318>came<s%> <S%H3318>forth<s%> out of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> them they had not <S%H4135>circumcised.<s%>

For the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H1980>walked<s%> <S%H705>forty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness,<s%> <S%H5704>till<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1471>people<s%> that were <S%H582>men<s%> of <S%H4421>war,<s%> which <S%H3318>came<s%> out of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> were <S%H8552>consumed,<s%> <S%H834>because<s%> they <S%H8085>obeyed<s%> not the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD:<s%> to <S%H834>whom<s%> <S%H1992><s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H7650>swore<s%> that he would not <S%H7200>show<s%> them the <S%H776>land,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H7650>swore<s%> to their <S%H1>fathers<s%> that he would <S%H5414>give<s%> us, a <S%H776>land<s%> that <S%H2100>flows<s%> with <S%H2461>milk<s%> and <S%H1706>honey.<s%>

And their <S%H1121>children,<s%> whom he <S%H6965>raised<s%> up in their <S%H8478>stead,<s%> them <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H4135>circumcised:<s%> for they were <S%H6189>uncircumcised,<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> they had not <S%H4135>circumcised<s%> them by the <S%H1870>way.<s%>

And it <S%H1961>came<s%> to pass, <S%H834>when<s%> they had <S%H8552>done<s%> <S%H4135>circumcising<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1471>people,<s%> that they <S%H3427>stayed<s%> in their <S%H8478>places<s%> in the <S%H4264>camp,<s%> <S%H5704>till<s%> they were <S%H2421>whole.<s%>

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3091>Joshua,<s%> This <S%H3117>day<s%> have I <S%H1556>rolled<s%> away the <S%H2781>reproach<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> from <S%H5921>off<s%> you. Why the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H4725>place<s%> is <S%H7121>called<s%> <S%H1537>Gilgal<s%> to <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H3117>day.<s%>

And the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H2583>encamped<s%> in <S%H1537>Gilgal,<s%> and <S%H6213>kept<s%> the <S%H6453>passover<s%> on the <S%H702>fourteenth<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> of the <S%H2320>month<s%> at <S%H6153>even<s%> in the <S%H6160>plains<s%> of <S%H3405>Jericho.<s%>

And they did <S%H398>eat<s%> of the <S%H5669>old<s%> <S%H5669>corn<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> on the <S%H4283>morrow<s%> after the <S%H6453>passover,<s%> <S%H4682>unleavened<s%> <S%H4682>cakes,<s%> and parched corn in the <S%H2088>selfsame<s%> <S%H6106><s%> <S%H3117>day.<s%>

And the <S%H4478>manna<s%> <S%H7673>ceased<s%> on the <S%H4283>morrow<s%> after they had <S%H398>eaten<s%> of the <S%H5669>old<s%> <S%H5669>corn<s%> of the <S%H776>land;<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> <S%H1961>had<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H4478>manna<s%> any <S%H5750>more;<s%> but they did <S%H398>eat<s%> of the <S%H8393>fruit<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan<s%> that <S%H8141>year.<s%>

And it <S%H1961>came<s%> to pass, when <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> was by <S%H3405>Jericho,<s%> that he <S%H5375>lifted<s%> up his <S%H5869>eyes<s%> and <S%H7200>looked,<s%> and, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> there <S%H5975>stood<s%> a <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H5048>over<s%> <S%H5048>against<s%> him with his <S%H2719>sword<s%> <S%H8025>drawn<s%> in his <S%H3027>hand:<s%> and <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H3212>went<s%> to him, and <S%H559>said<s%> to him, Are you for us, or for our <S%H6862>adversaries?<s%>

And he <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H3808>No;<s%> but as <S%H8269>captain<s%> of the <S%H6635>host<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> am I <S%H6258>now<s%> <S%H935>come.<s%> And <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H5307>fell<s%> <S%H413>on<s%> his <S%H6440>face<s%> to the <S%H776>earth,<s%> and did <S%H7812>worship,<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> to him, <S%H4100>What<s%> <S%H1696>said<s%> my <S%H113>Lord<s%> to his <S%H5650>servant?<s%>

And the <S%H8269>captain<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD's<s%> <S%H6635>host<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3091>Joshua,<s%> <S%H5394>Loose<s%> your <S%H5275>shoe<s%> from <S%H5921>off<s%> your <S%H7272>foot;<s%> for the <S%H4725>place<s%> where <S%H834>on<s%> <S%H5921><s%> you <S%H5975>stand<s%> is <S%H6944>holy.<s%> And <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> <S%H3651>so.<s%>
